SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTC_CMMN_CODE A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTC_CMMN_CL_CODE B ON A.CL_CODE = B.CL_CODE WHERE 1=1
AND A.CODE_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND A.CODE_ID_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND A.USE_AT = 'Y' AND A.CL_CODE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'

SELECT B.CL_CODE_NM AS "clCodeNm" , A.CL_CODE AS "clCode" , A.CODE_ID AS "codeId" , A.CODE_ID_NM AS "codeIdNm" , A.CODE_ID_DC AS "codeIdDc" , A.USE_AT AS "useAt" FROM COMTC_CMMN_CODE A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTC_CMMN_CL_CODE B ON A.CL_CODE = B.CL_CODE WHERE A.CODE_ID = #{codeId}
